itemInfo.itemDesc: A material used to change metals into a pure crystal form through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Alchemy.

item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Rough Stone
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered with a Pickaxe from any rock on the ground.

item.name: Melted Iron Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.

item.name: Trace of Savagery
item.desc: A material used for Crafting equipment.\nIt can be Excavated at Lynch Farm Ruins.

item.name: Moonlight Opal
item.desc:
A processed natural resource. It is used in alchemy and processing.

- Obtained by: Heating Metal Solvent and brilliant opal. You'll need the knowledge "Heating: Intermediate."

※ See Vatudun in Keplan to complete the quest "Materials for Skill Learning" to gain the knowledge.

※ In order to proceed with the quest, you have to reach Gathering Level Processional 10 and Processing Level Professional 5. Call Black Spirit (/ key) for details.

item.name: Pure Platinum Crystal
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Platinum Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.
